name: A.I. Invasion
description: A.I. Invasion is an action-loaded top-down-shooter in a futuristic setting. The superior machines subjugated the universe. In a wide range of missions you take the role of a soldier and equip and command a team of special units to reclaim the planet system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: Intel or AMD 2.0-3.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb, Directx 9.0c SM 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel/AMD 3.0+ GHz Quad Core or Greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Nvidia GT/GTS or ATI Radeon HD Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes:

reviews.review_text: Bad game, uninspired and boring. Save yourself the trouble, there are plenty games out there that do a better job
This game do not work. I am angry and confused, because I have tryed to set up it, but it was useless.
